APPAREL PRODUCTION MANAGER
Executive Profile
Creative Apparel Production Manager adept at product development design change and cost tracking to adhere to
budgetary guidelines.
Proficient in the use of design software to further expedite project completions.
Specialize in
applying creative approaches to design while managing daily production staff activities.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

to

Performed fabric tests to ensure quality compliance.
Oversaw daily facility activities.
Ensured that all facility maintenance procedures were followed.
